Department of Civil and Materials Engineering     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Department of Civil and Materials Engineering      Department of Civil and Materials Engineering   Main Menu    Undergraduate           Admitted Students    Admissions    Accreditation    Civil Engineering Major    Courses    Minors    Internships and Jobs    Student Groups    Student Profiles    Student Resources         Graduate           Admitted Students    Admissions    Courses    NEW MS in Construction Engineering and Management    MS Programs    PhD Programs    PhD Dissertations    Post-Graduation Outcomes    Student Profiles    Student Resources         Research           High-Bay Structures Laboratory    Labs    Research Areas    Student Research Opportunities    Seminars         Faculty and Staff           Department Head    Core Faculty    Courtesy and Dual Appointments    Emeritus Faculty    Faculty Awards    Professional Advisory Council    Staff    Open Positions         News    Events     Eyebrow menu    Giving    Alumni    College of Engineering Home    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search               View Menu           Breadcrumbs   Department of Civil and Materials Engineering    Faculty and Staff    Courtesy and Dual Appointments        Courtesy and Dual Appointments  The civil and materials engineering department benefits from the knowledge and perspective of several UIC faculty members who have their primary appointments in other university departments and hold a dual or courtesy faculty position in CME. The name of each of these faculty members below is linked to his or her home department profile page.       Courtesy and Dual Appointments    Abiade, Jeremiah , Associate Professor, Department of Mechanical and Industrial Engineering  Dutta, Mitra , UIC Distinguished Professor, Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering  Hatami-Marbini, Hamed ,  Associate Professor, Department of Mechanical and Industrial Engineering  Kawamura, Kazuya , Professor, College of Urban Planning and Public Affairs  Mathew, Mathew T. , Associate Professor, Richard and Loan Hill Department of Bioengineering  Shahbazian-Yassar, Reza , Professor, Department of Mechanical and Industrial Engineering           Faculty and Staff           Department Head    Core Faculty    Courtesy and Dual Appointments    Emeritus Faculty    Faculty Awards    Professional Advisory Council    Staff    Open Positions
